short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a scannable QR code to relevant SKUs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a QR code to product pages on JB Hi-Fi for in-store scanning by salespeople. If your store has security panels on monitors, then scan from a slight offset. 

Designed for full-screen, desktop computers.

23/04: This extension is no longer being maintained.

05/09: Oops I maintained the extension. But only because I like my coworkers. On a more real note, stop obfuscating the class names in your HTML, JB. It things 1000x harder to fix.
